Name: Sprint Duration Limit
Description: Sprint duration must not exceed 4 weeks

Name: One Role per Employee
Description: An employee should not take multiple conflicting roles

Name: Feature Budget Cap
Description: Each feature must stay under budget threshold

Name: Effort Limit per Sprint
Description: Sprint backlog should not exceed team capacity

Name: Retrospective Moderation Only by Scrum Master
Daily Scrum Timing
Description: Daily Scrum must be held during working hours

Name: User Story to Task Ratio
Description: Maintain a healthy ratio of stories to sub-tasks
